a8d4d58a-51cd-42c9-ab54-d6e93424ed1b.description: Earners of the Digital U: Growth Mindset badge have completed a set of modules and knowledge exams that was developed in partnership with Accenture. Topics covered include the impact of a Growth Mindset on cross-functional teams, Growth Mindset vs. Fixed Mindset, and Growth Mindset for innovation. To put their knowledge to work learners participate in Team Action Sessions.
a8d4d58a-51cd-42c9-ab54-d6e93424ed1b.name: Digital U: Growth Mindset

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the following courses: • Digital U: Our Journey to Becoming a Digital Champion for Employees• Growth Mindset vs. Fixed Mindset• MINDSET by Carol Dweck• Learning Goals vs. Performance Goals to Build a Growth Mindset Culture• Impact of a Growth Mindset on Cross-Functional Teams• Success Factors for Innovation
Complete the Digital U: Growth Mindset curriculum and a Team Action Session to practice knowledge and engage in lively discussion about best practices.
Pass each course in the Digital U: Growth MIndset curriculum knowledge assessment and participate in the corresponding 1Huddle gaming exercise with 85% or higher.

ea48c7ac-b867-4f26-ad72-614b5a5c5160.description: Earners of the Digital U: Data Driven Decisions badge have completed a set of modules and knowledge exams that was developed in partnership with Accenture. Topics covered include data driven decisions, the Self-Service Analytics Model, common biases in decision making, and applying data driven analytics. To put their knowledge to work learners participate in Team Action Sessions.
ea48c7ac-b867-4f26-ad72-614b5a5c5160.name: Digital U: Data Driven Decisions

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the following courses: • Data Driven Decision Making• Overview of Single Version of Truth (SVOT) and Related Components• Decision Making in a Future of Big Data and AI• The Four Interdependent Layers in a Self-Service Analytics Model• Facilitating Decision Making Using an Enterprise Data Hub (EDH)• Biases in Decision Making• Using Data Driven Decisions at Fossil Group
Complete the Digital U: Data Driven Decisions curriculum and a Team Action Session.
Pass each course in the Digital U: Growth Mindset curriculum knowledge assessment and participate in the corresponding 1Huddle gaming exercise with 85% or higher.

27ba6b3d-cf9b-4b96-ad58-f59b717c3c9f.description: Earners of the Digital U: Digital Ethics badge have completed a curated curriculum including a knowledge exam. Topics covered include using digital ethics along with data privacy best practices to build a standard of trust and accountability for customers. To put their knowledge to work, learners engaged with peers by sharing challenging ethical situations and ways to overcome these challenges.
27ba6b3d-cf9b-4b96-ad58-f59b717c3c9f.name: Digital U: Digital Ethics

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the following items: Using Digital Ethics White Paper, “A Tech-Savvy Workforce” podcast with Deloitte's Catherine Bannister, Digital Ethics knowledge assessment and Digital U Community board engagement post
Complete the Digital U: Digital Ethics curriculum post on the Digital U Hub community board to engage in lively discussion about best practices.
Complete each course in the Digital U: Digital Ethics curriculum and pass the knowledge assessment with 85% or higher.

921a1210-a50f-4481-91d5-09b6757bc7ae.description: Earners of this badge completed the Leadership DNA program, an experience designed for retail leaders leading in the digital world. Over three months, Leadership DNA participants engaged in an online learning curriculum, workbook activities, virtual workshops, peer-to-peer social learning, one-on-one sessions with mentors, and demonstrated their proficiency through a knowledge exam. These individuals understand the foundation of Leadership DNA and apply it when leading a digital native team.
921a1210-a50f-4481-91d5-09b6757bc7ae.name: Leadership DNA

badge_template_activities.title: The earner will complete all courses (15 hours) within Fossil Group's Leadership DNA Program and demonstrate their proficiency through a knowledge exam. The courses include topics of: Building Interpersonal Skills, Establishing Yourself at Work, Increasing Knowledge and Self-awareness, Learning to Influence, Managing up, and Collaborating.

The earner will attend all five virtual sessions (5 hours) with other Leadership DNA participants and discuss, reflect, and share how learnings from the program have been applied on the job in their stores.

The earner will take part in peer-to-peer social learning activities to network and collaborate on business practices. They will also participate in a coaching session with a mentor to discuss learnings from the program and review action plans.

dfbbc38d-68fc-4aa2-9321-1e209802aa25.description: Earners of the Hybrid at Fossil badge know how to be successful when working in an in-office and remote environment. These individuals understand the nuances of hybrid working, such as autonomy and trust through accountability, and how this style of work promotes a balance between flexibility and structure. These individuals are capable of maximizing productivity along with engaging in the company culture to maximize wellbeing.
dfbbc38d-68fc-4aa2-9321-1e209802aa25.name: Hybrid at Fossil

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a online learning module outlining Fossil Group's hybrid working approach.

1801ec83-9c6a-4a38-ae34-c7c02aa78aba.description: Earners of the Pursuit badge have completed a leadership development program that spans over nine months. The program provides self-reflection through thinking style and 360 assessments, coursework including peer dialogue on Career Management, Strategic Thinking, EQ, Influencing, Executive Presence, Innovation, Digital Intelligence, and Developing Your Team. The earner also interacts with senior leaders and creates a capstone project that includes presentations to our C-Level executives.
1801ec83-9c6a-4a38-ae34-c7c02aa78aba.name: Pursuit Leadership Development Program

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all required assessments, courses, workshops, and assignments outlined in the Pursuit program curriculum.
Based on learnings create a Individual Development plan that goes beyond the program.
Participant on our Culture Team to further their growth by gaining an understanding of how to impact culture and engagement at scale.

2dfe7bb6-2b5d-4ff3-a29f-336f60b41047.description: Earners of the Compass Leadership badge have completed 16 hours of an interactive workshop, that leverages the experiences of the leaders in the room. The Compass program gives leaders the mindset, tools, and skills needed to accelerate their leadership capability. Learners are able to connect their team to the company strategy, build effective relationships, set clear expectations, provide actionable feedback, coach the development of direct reports, and celebrate wins to deliver results.
2dfe7bb6-2b5d-4ff3-a29f-336f60b41047.name: Compass Leadership Development Program

badge_template_activities.title: Attend all Compass Leadership Development sessions and apply skills on the job.

b407514c-8a18-4789-b8f7-3b752d401f5c.description: Earners of the W!NGed. Leadership Development Program badge have completed three months of extensively curated interactive workshops that include peer-to-peer development and independent learning. These workshops are designed to provide opportunities for real-life applications of networking, Growth Mindset, confidence building, and risk-taking. These individuals understand the value of owning their career journey to create a long-term sustainable pipeline of strong female leaders.
b407514c-8a18-4789-b8f7-3b752d401f5c.name: W!NGEd. Leadership Development Program (Women Inspired to Network & Grow Through Education)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Fossil's Compass Leadership Program, be a female Manager, Director, or Senior Director, and be in their leadership role for a minimum of 18 months.
Complete all of the W!NGed. Leadership Program's interactive workshops; Declare Your Brand, Radiate Confidence, Influence Your Career, Fail Forward, SuperPower Your Network.
Complete all five activity sessions within each workshop with other female leaders and use independent learning to practice, reflect and apply learnings.

d8cfd963-a985-48c4-aa9a-d25ec6b383aa.description: Earners of the Fossil Group Onboarding badge have completed three months of customized onboarding curriculum covering introductions to Fossil Group's employee self-service resources, benefits, hybrid work environment, navigating the learning portal, professional development offerings, compliance, and performance metrics. These individuals understand the inner workings of the culture and are capable of navigating the company to drive shared success.
d8cfd963-a985-48c4-aa9a-d25ec6b383aa.name: Onboarding at Fossil for Individual Contributor

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all courses (18 hrs) within Fossil Group's onboarding curriculum for Individual Contributors. Welcome Home Orientation, Navigating the Learning Portal, Hybrid at Fossil Group, Understanding Performance, Creating Impactful Scorecards, Understanding Bias
Complete all knowledge assessments within Fossil's onboarding curriculum for Individual Contributors with a score of 85% or better.
Meet with assigned Fossil Buddy to network and acclimate to Fossil Group.

ec73762a-e432-4494-800e-352076e8af67.description: Earners of the Owning Your Career badge have completed a two-day workshop with interactive feedback sessions designed to explore owning one's career path and leveraging development tools to reach goals. These individuals understand the value of redefining success through self-awareness and the importance of professional goal setting. These individuals are capable of making impactful choices to enrich and propel their career.
ec73762a-e432-4494-800e-352076e8af67.name: Owning your Career

badge_template_activities.title: Complete two virtual workshops to explore career paths and tools to leverage and analyze current skill sets, locate development opportunities, and set professional goals.
Complete two virtual feedback scenario sessions designed to interact with and receive feedback from peers.

fd86cc19-733b-4f89-9276-af2f18764d74.description: Earners of the Successfully Onboarding Employees badge have completed a online module covering Fossil Group's onboarding process and how to inspire self-development to retain great talent. These individuals understand the value of facilitating a great onboarding experience to build relationships with new hires and foster team immersion. These individuals are capable of strategically planning onboarding to ensure increased employee retention, engagement, and commitment.
fd86cc19-733b-4f89-9276-af2f18764d74.name: Successfully Onboarding Employees

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a online learning module outlining the Fossil Group onboarding process to help new hires adjust to their new role.
Review and acknowledge Fossil Group's onboarding resources for ordering technology and assigning shadowing partners.

338d5d32-9f65-4749-9055-c15c62edce79.description: Earners of the Digital U: Digital Champion badge have completed three digitally focused curriculums developed in partnership with Accenture including Growth Mindset, Data Driven Decision Making, and Digital Ethics, as well as three Team Action Sessions. These individuals understand the value of digital fluency and the benefits of mastering digital foundations.
338d5d32-9f65-4749-9055-c15c62edce79.name: Digital U: Digital Champion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all three learning curriculums: • Growth Mindset • Data Driven Decisions • Digital Ethics
Complete all three Team Action Sessions.
Pass all three phases of the Digital U: Digital Champion curriculum knowledge assessments and participate in all three 1Huddle gaming exercises with 85% or higher.

b9261605-34e1-4e0c-968c-6477fbb31a4f.description: Earners of the Hiring Like a Boss badge have attended a two-hour, interactive training workshop and completed three online modules covering Fossil Group's hiring process. Earners understand the nuances of identifying and selecting candidates and the value of proactively recruiting using proven behavior-based interviewing techniques. These individuals demonstrate the foundation of talent selection and conducting interviews that are ethical and legal on their path to secure top-tier talent.
b9261605-34e1-4e0c-968c-6477fbb31a4f.name: Hiring Like a Boss

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the following online courses: Understanding the Hiring Process • Preparing for the Interview • Conducting and Interview
Complete a 2-hour instructor-led virtual workshop to practice applying knowledge, receiving feedback from peers, and engaging in lively discussion about best practices.

skills.name: How to Prepare for an Interview

fce2ae3c-81b1-4ed9-ab27-9473dbeee7e0.description: Earners of the Leading at Fossil Badge have learned how to quickly and successfully transition into leadership at Fossil Group using the critically acclaimed Harvard Business Review publication "The First 90 Days". These individuals understand Fossil Groups leadership expectations, philosophies, and how to engage and develop a team to drive meaningful and measurable results that align with the company’s strategic priorities.
fce2ae3c-81b1-4ed9-ab27-9473dbeee7e0.name: Leading at Fossil Group

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a online learning module outlining Fossil Group's approach to leadership.

82093edd-41b7-4de8-bbb3-5cff1cd70c26.description: Earners of the Leading Hybrid at Fossil badge know how to be successful in leading a team in an in-office and remote environment. These individuals understand the benefits of hybrid working on their management style such as increased accountability, employee autonomy, and increased employee wellbeing. These individuals are capable of maximizing the productivity of teams while promoting both flexibility and structure.
82093edd-41b7-4de8-bbb3-5cff1cd70c26.name: Leading Hybrid at Fossil

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a online learning module outlining leadership strategies to manage hybrid teams within Fossil Group's hybrid working approach.

59d3f73f-7b27-4051-8fc9-45d028a04160.description: Earners of the Fossil Group Onboarding badge have completed three months of customized onboarding curriculum covering introductions to Fossil Group's employee self-service resources, benefits, hybrid work environment, navigating the learning portal, professional development offerings, compliance, and performance metrics. These individuals have mastered what it means to be a leader at Fossil Group and are capable of personifying company culture.
59d3f73f-7b27-4051-8fc9-45d028a04160.name: Onboarding at Fossil for Leaders

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all courses (30 hrs) with Fossil Group's onboarding curriculum for Leaders. Welcome Home Orientation, Navigating the Learning Portal, Hybrid at Fossil Group, Understanding Bias, Leading Hybrid at Fossil, Leading at Fossil, Performance Management, Various Compliance topics
Complete all knowledge assessments within Fossil's onboarding curriculum for Leaders with a score of 85% or better.
Meet with assigned Fossil Buddy to network and acclimate to Fossil Group.
